notes: Populated places of Liberia with pcodes, provided by UNMIL in 2011. This dataset was created during a Village Mapping (VM) exercise that was conducted from November 2004 to March 2005 to update the villages and boundaries within Liberia. The VM was facilitated by the Humanitarian Information Centre (HIC) for Liberia, UNMIL GIS Unit, UNMIL Electoral Division and NEC with collaboration with verity of other agencies.
